column5: Come relax in the country. Sits on 120 acres with many nature trails and abundant wildlife. Outdoor patios with grill and fire pit. 2 bedrooms (queen size beds) and 1.5 bath. Fully equipped kitchen. There is a smaller cottage nearby and we offer a discount for renting both cottages. Pool available upon request and use of the pool is at your own risk.
column8: STUNNING! Country Cottage 5 mi N Weatherford
